== getenv ==
{{{
public function getenv( name:String ):String
}}}
Retrieve an environment variable.

*example:* basic usage
{{{
import C.stdlib.*;

var home:String = getenv( "HOME" );
trace( "user home: " + home ); //user home: /Users/somebody
}}}

*since:* 0.3.0
